mapper.select: select IFNULL(id,'')as id, IFNULL(title,'')as title, IFNULL(create_time,'')as create_time, IFNULL(report_person,'')as report_person, IFNULL(report_reason,'')as report_reason, IFNULL(report_quarter,'')as report_quarter, IFNULL(report_text,'')as report_text, IFNULL(report_failname,'')as report_failname, IFNULL(initiatorclass,'')as initiatorclass, IFNULL(status,'')as status, IFNULL(money_source,'')as money_source, IFNULL(arrival_time,'')as arrival_time, IFNULL(amount,'')as amount, IFNULL(finance_time,'')as finance_time, IFNULL(toarea_time,'')as toarea_time, IFNULL(areaname,'')as areaname, IFNULL(text,'')as text, IFNULL(replytext,'')as replytext, IFNULL(dealtext,'')as dealtext, IFNULL(capitalflowinstruction,'')as capitalflowinstruction, IFNULL(guihuakeshenqing,'')as guihuakeshenqing, IFNULL(quxianshenqingren,'')as quxianshenqingren, IFNULL(caiwuchuliren,'')as caiwuchuliren, IFNULL(guihuachuliren,'')as guihuachuliren, IFNULL(guihuapifuren,'')as guihuapifuren, IFNULL(caiwuzhuanzhangren,'')as caiwuzhuanzhangren, IFNULL(quxianbaocunren,'')as quxianbaocunren, IFNULL(quxiantijiaoren,'')as quxiantijiaoren from capitalflow where id = #{id}
